home.welcomeMessage: Easily learn flags and capitals from around the world

validation.pattern: Allowed characters: letters, numbers, periods (.), dashes (-), and underscores (_)

stats.maxStreakDescription: The maximum number of streaks in one game

gameOver.title: Game over
gameOver.encouragement: Try again and beat your score. ðŸ’ª

training_infinite.title: Training mode: The flags will be displayed in an infinite loop.
training_infinite.description: Flags you get wrong will come back more often. Flags you get right will appear less frequently.

challenge.title: Challenge mode: Guess the flags accurately
challenge.description: The goal is to guess the most flags in a row. Try to beat your best score!
challenge.subDescription: The game will stop on first failure.

training_infinite.title: Training mode: The countries will be displayed in an infinite loop.
training_infinite.description: The goal is for you to learn the capital cities: each mistake is a chance to improve!
training_infinite.subDescription: Cities you get wrong will come back more often. Cities you get right will appear less frequently.

challenge.title: Challenge mode: Guess the capital city accurately
challenge.description: The goal is to guess the most cities in a row. Try to beat your best score!
challenge.subDescription: The game will stop on first failure.

note.title: Notes
note.note1: Use the search suggestions to help you
note.note2: Pressing Enter will select the first suggestion in the list and submit it.

flags.note1: Flags are on scale with their official size. Therefore, the size of the flag on the screen is not always the same.

capitals.note1: Be careful, some countries have several accepted capitals. You need to enter all of them.
